title: Self-Dual Chern-Simons Solitons with Non-Compact Groups
abstract: It is shown how to couple non-relativistic matter with a Chern--Simons gauge field that belongs to a non-compact group. We treat in some details the $SL(2,{\bf R})$ and the Poincar\'e $ISO(2,1)$ groups. For suitable self-interactions, we are able to exhibit soliton solutions.
